mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tables ( shop_id, table_name, status, is_deleted ) VALUES ( #{shopId}, #{tableName}, #{status}, #{isDeleted} )
mapper.select: SELECT table_id AS tableId, shop_id AS shopId, table_name AS tableName, status, is_deleted AS isDeleted FROM tables WHERE shop_id = #{shopId} AND table_name = #{tableName} LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tables WHERE table_id = #{tableId} AND status = 0 AND is_deleted = false
